original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1186)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(641)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，且在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(144)@</color> 秒內對敵方全體造成恐懼狀態。
text: <color=#FFE787> Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1186)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(641)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage on the enemy within its own range, and in <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(144)@</color> seconds, it causes a state of fear on all the enemies.
